name: Damocles's Caretaker
description:
It is the 379th year of the reign of his imperial majesty. You have been charged with keeping his life support systems operational during his hearings with the common folk. Do not fail in your duty, for without the Emperor's guiding light, humanity would be plunged into darkness.

Made using Löve2d for Extra Credits Jam 6.

Thank you to freesound for supplying the audio effects used in the game.
